subject: Deaths (Obituaries)
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Joe Niekro was the knuckleballing right-hander who won 221 major league games in 22 seasons and combined with his Hall of Fame brother Phil to win more games than any pair of brothers in major league history.
snippet: Joe Niekro was the knuckleballing right-hander who won 221 major league games in 22 seasons and combined with his Hall of Fame brother Phil to win more games than any pair of brothers in major league history.
